description:
Desk Assistant Pro for the HP TouchPad, the ORIGINAL Swiss Army Knife of utilities, is extremely useful in the office, home & school. These are tools for weather, stocks, finance, calculations, computer utilities and mailing, shipping and tracking. Weather is updated throughout the day and the stock ticker runs along the bottom of the screen showing major indices along and selected stocks. 

Version 1.3.1 includes up and down arrows for the stock ticker and defect fixes for DST, sometimes ticker not starting, and keyboard overlap on weather zipcode popup.

See our website for a lot more detailed information. Checkout the help file, which is a duplicate of the help file found in the app, to get a good understanding of what's available.

Here are highlights of the functionality found in this app: 
o Weather
-- Optional local weather
--- Turn On or Off
---- Select Zipcode

o TIPPING AND FINANCE
-- Stock Market Ticker
-- How much to Tip
-- Loan monthly payment
-- Credit Card costs
-- Savings
-- Currency Conversion

o MEASUREMENT CONVERSION
-- Length
-- Temperature
-- Weight
-- Liquid Measure
-- Dry Measure
-- Area
-- Angles
-- Date Arithmetic

o FIND A DATE
-- Add days to a date
-- Subtract days from a date
-- Number of days between two dates

o FRACTION/DECIMAL CONVERSION
-- Convert fraction to decimal
-- Convert decimal to fraction
---- (round to nearest useful measurement fraction, e.g. 8ths, 16ths)

o CALCULATE SIZE OF AN AREA
-- Circle
-- Square
-- Rectangle
-- Equilateral Triangle
-- Right Triangle
-- Scalene Triangle
-- Parallelogram
-- Trapezoid

o COMPUTER UTILITIES
-- Convert between number bases
-- Convert character to Ascii
-- Convert Ascii to character

o AREA CODES
-- Area Code/Prefix lookup

o TIME ZONES
-- Local time for many US Cities
-- Links to popular World Cities
-- World Timezone Map

o ZIP CODES
-- Find Zip Code (link)

o US POST OFFICE
-- USPS utilities (link)

o FEDEX
-- FedEx utilities {link}

o UPS
-- UPS utilities {link)
